name: HP 2530-24G Switch
description: HP switches, now commonly known as Aruba or HPE (Hewlett Packard Enterprise) switches.

name: VMware vCenter
description: VMware vCenter is advanced server management software that provides a centralized platform for controlling your VMware vSphere environments.

name: VMware ESXi
description: VMware ESXi is a bare-metal hypervisor that allows multiple operating systems to run as virtual machines on a single physical server.

name: Proxmox
description: Proxmox Virtual Environment is an open source server virtualization management solution based on QEMU/KVM and LXC.

name: Synology NAS DS923+
description: The Synology DS923+ is a powerful 4-bay network-attached storage (NAS) device designed for small businesses and home offices.

name: Plex
description: Plex is streaming platform to offer movies, shows, and live TV together.

name: Taiga
description: Taiga.io is a free and open-source project management tool designed for agile teams.

name: n8n
description: Secure Workflow Automation for Technical Teams.

name: Vaultwarden
description: An alternative server implementation of the Bitwarden Client API, written in Rust and compatible with official Bitwarden clients.

name: Vault
description: HashiCorp Vault is a tool that securely manages secrets and sensitive data, such as API keys, passwords, and certificates.
